first.title: Welcome to Tempoou!
first.content: Here you get informations about the weather forecast for any city of {{country}} and world!

second.title: Know the right weather forecast!
second.content: With Tempoou you can always rely on the always updated forecast!

third.title: Enjoy all resources for free!
third.content: Enjoy all resources that the Tempoou you can offer totally free!

noNetwork.title: Internet is down!
noNetwork.content: For use our services, is need a internet connection!

tellACity.title: Tell a city!
tellACity.content: I need a city for get a weather forecast!

cityNotFound.title: City not found!
cityNotFound.content: The city '{{city}}' not found! Revise the name or try again in a few seconds!
